name: Auditing
description: Degree to which the AI system is subject to regular, independent, and comprehensive audits.

values.name: Independent Audits
values.description: Regular independent audits by reputable third parties, with formal verification of the system's security, fairness, and ethical performance.

values.name: Internal Audits
values.description: Regular internal audits conducted, covering all aspects of the AI system lifecycle, with clear audit trails and documentation.

values.name: Limited Audits
values.description: Infrequent or limited audits, with no independent verification.

values.name: None
values.description: No auditing of the AI system's design, development, deployment, or operation.
